About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Data Science Enthusiast with interest leaning towards NLP and Deep learning. A dedicated learner with a strong foundation in Python, SQL and data visualization and strong motivation to learning new technologies in the field of Machine Learning and Deep Learning ready to tackle complex challenges and deliver actionable insights to drive business growth.

Deloitte : July 2018 - Sep 2019

• Lead the development of performance tests using locust and jmeter. • Developed python scripts to validate data in crystal reports and reduced manual effort of business analysts before release. • Award : Best Performance

Moody's Analytics : Oct 2019 - present

• Lead development of performance tests using K6 (JavaScript) to identify performance bottlenecks in Stored procedures. Reduced client tickets related to performance by 15%. • Developed the ability in the automation framework to perform localization in runtime and eliminated manual effort for the same. • Introduced parallelization using selenium grid in the automation framework and reduced execution time by 20%. • Award : Silver Award
